column3: drake when i um i had rap rap joints out there and people were like yeah he's nice you know  interviewer it's hard to go from kid tv show to rapper  drake it is it is but you know the more and more we were consistent it proved it turned from a flaw to an attribute you know it's like it makes the story better i think at this point  interviewer especially when the music is good and they're like yo he's real  drake we started just putting songs out  interviewer so are you aware are you feeling this this this energy around you right now there's people talkin' about you he knows he knows yeah like how does that feel what does that feel like to you  drake every every like i said i'm very humbled by it i feel very blessed and umm yeah i'm never gonna let it set in i just wanna keep i just wanna keep working to be honest with you  interviewer ride the wave baby ride the wave and you have some big interest too like i know you're working there's one with lil' wayne and you did umm just talk in the studio with some different people can you talk about yet or no  drake i've been working i've been working all week with some of new york city's finest umm artists i haven't been working with new york city's finest  interviewer let's clean that up
